titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning the adjournment of Michaelmas term.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: "Given at Oxford the six and twentieth day of September, in the seventeenth year of his Majesties reign".

Reproduction of original in the British Library.
